ADD_DEPENDENCIES_ADDED: Dependencies added to the manifest file.

CREATE_PROJECT_QUESTION_INCLUDE_UNIT_TES: Do you want to include unit testing with the Jest testing framework?

ERRORS_NO_ACTIVE_FILE: To run this command, first select a file in a SuiteCloud project to make it active in the editor.
ERRORS_NO_ACTIVE_WORKSPACE: There was an error. The current file does not belong to any workspace.
ERRORS_SDK_JAVA_VERSION_NOT_COMPATIBLE: Your Java version {0} is not compatible with SuiteCloud Extension for Visual Studio Code. Install Oracle JDK version {1}.

EXTENSION_INSTALLATION_ERROR_SDK_INVALID: Close and open the editor to try again.

EXTENSION_PROJECT_STARTUP_MESSAGE_PROJEC: No account has been set up for this project. Click "SuiteCloud: Setup Account" to link your project with your account.
IMPORT_FILES_QUESTIONS_CHOOSE_OPTION: You should choose at least one option.
IMPORT_FILES_ERROR: The importing process has encountered an error.
IMPORT_FILES_PROCESS_CANCELED: The file import process has been canceled. No custom files have been overwritten.
IMPORT_FILES_QUESTIONS_EXCLUDE_PROPERTIE: Do you want to exclude all file properties within the .attributes folder?
IMPORT_FILES_QUESTIONS_SELECT_FILES: Select the files you want to import to your project.
IMPORT_FILES_QUESTIONS_OVERRIDE: All the files in the project will be overwritten with the files from the account. Do you want to continue?
IMPORT_FILES_QUESTIONS_OVERRIDE_SINGLE: The {0} file will be overwritten with the file from the account. Do you want to continue?
IMPORT_OBJECTS_ERROR_EMPTY_LIST: There are no objects matching your search criteria. Select a different set of object types, and if applicable, check the specified application ID or script ID.
IMPORT_OBJECTS_ERROR_INCORRECT_FOLDER: To Import an Object, please select a valid location inside the Object Folder
IMPORT_OBJECTS_PROCESS_CANCELED: The object import process has been canceled. No custom files have been overwritten.
IMPORT_OBJECTS_QUESTIONS_APP_ID: Press Enter to use '{0}', or enter your application ID.
IMPORT_OBJECTS_QUESTIONS_FILTER_APP_ID: Do you want to import objects from a specific SuiteApp?
IMPORT_OBJECTS_QUESTIONS_OVERWRITE: All the selected objects in the project will be overwritten with the objects from the account. Do you want to continue?
IMPORT_OBJECTS_QUESTIONS_OVERWRITE_WITH_: All the selected objects and their referenced SuiteScript files in the project will be overwritten with the objects and files from the account. Do you want to continue?
IMPORT_OBJECTS_QUESTIONS_REFERENCED_FILE: Do you want to import the SuiteScript files referenced in the objects?
IMPORT_OBJECTS_QUESTIONS_SCRIPT_ID: Enter the full or partial script ID to filter your list or leave it blank and press Enter if not.
IMPORT_OBJECTS_QUESTIONS_SELECT_OBJECTS: Select the object you want to import.
IMPORT_OBJECTS_QUESTIONS_SELECT_TYPES: Select the object types you want to import or select none to list them all.
LIST_FILES_SELECT_FOLDER: Select the path from where you want to list the files

MANAGE_ACCOUNTS_CREATE_CONTINUE_IN_BROWS: Continue the authentication process in the prompted browser.
